articles.author: Bension Siebert
articles.title: Why can't the Australian Electoral Commission just enrol everyone when they turn 18? - ABC News
articles.description: Knowing you exist and that you're over 18 isn't enough to get onto the electoral roll. While half a million Australians are likely to miss out on voting this federal election, it's not as simple as being automatically added to the list.
articles.content:
Roughly half a million Australians are likely to miss out on voting at the federal election in May.
Key points:

articles.title: Solar flare causes radio blackout over parts of Asia, Australia; Sun to be even more active this week - India Today
articles.description: The Sun erupted on Sunday, sending out X1 class solar flares towards Earth. Astronomers are tracking a cluster of sunspots on the surface that could lead to more flares this week.

articles.title: Australians under lockdown in Shanghai fear family separation as city reports first COVID deaths - ABC News
articles.description: Australians living under Shanghai's strict COVID lockdown say taking infected children away from their parents is "inhumane".
